item.title: Nike Shopping
item.dc:creator: shadowwp
item.content:encoded:
Curology Skin

I build and activate brands through cultural insight, strategic vision, and the power of emotion across every element of its expression.

Scroll

Project Brief

My job is to build your website so that it is functional and user friendly but at the same time attractive. My aim is to bring across your message and identity in the most creative way.

I enjoy turning complex problems into simple, beautiful and intuitive interface designs. When Im not coding or pushing pixels, youll find me in the pool or on the court shooting hoops.

Client

LiquidThemes

Role

UI Designer
Development
Branding
Photoshoot

Date

2021

My Approach

Our eCommerce design starts and ends with a best-in-class experience strategy that builds brands and drives transactions.

My job is to build your website so that it is functional and user friendly but at the same time attractive. My aim is to bring across your message and identity in the most creative way. Its time to bring it all together. Nothing is more rewarding for me than making great work for clients with meaningful missions.

The Solution

Its time to bring it all together. Nothing is more rewarding for me than making great work for clients with meaningful missions. Through a deep understanding of our audiences makeup and motivations, we design digital experiences that connect with people.

We build and activate brands through cultural insight, strategic vision, and the power of emotion across every element of its expression

Human Experience

Our eCommerce design starts and ends with a best-in-class experience strategy that builds brands and drives transactions.

My job is to build your website so that it is functional and user friendly but at the same time attractive. My aim is to bring across your message and identity in the most creative way. Its time to bring it all together. Nothing is more rewarding for me than making great work for clients with meaningful missions.

Prototyping

Lets collaborate and make an impact with my cross-discipline approach to design and deveopment.

My job is to build your website so that it is functional and user friendly but at the same time attractive. My aim is to bring across your message and identity in the most creative way. I enjoy turning complex problems into simple, beautiful and intuitive interface designs. When Im not coding or pushing pixels, youll find me in the pool or on the court shooting hoops.

Testimonials

Such a solid theme. Well coded, organized and easy to set up and customize. Customer support has also been great when I have had questions. Online documentation is very comprehensive.

Branding Strategy

Mercedez-Benz Coupe

We provide digital experience services to startups and small businesses. We help our clients succeed by creating brand identities, digital experiences, and print materials. Install any demo, plugin or template in a matter of seconds.

item.dc:creator: shadowwp
item.content:encoded:
Branding Strategy

Artboard Studio

We provide digital experience services to startups and small businesses. We help our clients succeed by creating brand identities, digital experiences, and print materials. Install any demo, plugin or template in a matter of seconds.

Client

LiquidThemes

Designer

Date

June 2020

Share

item.title: Inspiration Board
item.dc:creator: shadowwp
item.content:encoded:
Inspiration Board

Artboard Studio

We provide digital experience services to startups and small businesses. We help our clients succeed by creating brand identities, digital experiences, and print materials. Install any demo, plugin or template in a matter of seconds.

Client

LiquidThemes

Role

UI Designer

Date

Sep 2020

Deliverables

UI Design, Development

Features based on events and occasions.

Previous Mercedez-Benz Coupe Next Villa in Dallas

item.title: Kontrast
item.dc:creator: shadowwp
item.content:encoded:
Kontrast

Art Direction User Interface Branding Strategy Print Design 3D Render Site of the Day Honorable Mention We provide digital experience services to startups and small businesses. We help our clients succeed by creating brand identities, digital experiences, and print materials. Install any demo, plugin or template in a matter of seconds. Just select the demo and click OK. Its that easy! The latest design trends meet hand-crafted templates in Ave Collection. Use pre-built sections to speed up your design process. Open a beautiful store, increase your conversion rates and boost your sales in minutes with object-oriented UX. 01 02 03 04 05 next project Photo Retouching

item.title: Photo Retouching
item.dc:creator: shadowwp
item.content:encoded:
Photogprahy

Photo Retouching

We provide digital experience services to startups and small businesses. We help our clients succeed by creating brand identities, digital experiences, and print materials. Install any demo, plugin or template in a matter of seconds.

Client

Liquid Themes

Role

Photographer

Date

June 2020

Share

Testimonials

Such a solid theme. Well coded, organized and easy to set up and customize. Customer support has also been great when I have had questions. Online documentation is very comprehensive.

Such a solid theme. Well coded, organized and easy to set up and customize. Customer support has also been great when I have had questions. Online documentation is very comprehensive.

this is Robert Sanchez.

My name is Roberto, Im a freelance Branding & Digital Designer based by the valley in New York. I currently work at Liquid. I create brand identities, digital experiences, and print materials that communicate clearly achieve marketing goals, and look fantastic. beauty and technical performance. Our design starts and ends a best-in-class experience strategy that builds brands.

2020 CEO LiquidThemes

2019 Genius Tech Apple

2018 Tech Special Google

2015 Graduated from Yale

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: shadowwp
item.content:encoded:
Zack
Cherry

.Interaction. Design. .Strategy.
Mobile App. Development

About About

About me

My name is Roberto, Im a freelance Branding & Digital Designer based by the valley in New York. I currently work at Liquid. I create brand identities, digital experiences, and print materials that communicate clearly achieve marketing goals, and look fantastic. beauty and technical performance. Our design starts and ends best-in-class experience strategy that builds brands.

Digital UI Design

Im a freelance Branding & Digital Designer based by the valley in New York. I currently work at Liquid. I create brand identities, digital experiences,

Product Design

Im a freelance Branding & Digital Designer based by the valley in New York. I currently work at Liquid. I create brand identities, digital experiences,

Business Consultation

Im a freelance Branding & Digital Designer based by the valley in New York. I currently work at Liquid. I create brand identities, digital experiences,

Experience
  • 2020 CEO LiquidThemes
  • 2019 Senior Designer Apple
  • 2018 Junior Designer Google
  • 2015 Graduated from Yale
Skills
  • Art Direction
  • Brand Strategy
  • Communication
  • Graphic Design
  • Print Design
  • Motion Graphics
  • Brand Guide
  • Flayer Design
  • Video Production
  • Web Advertising
  • Illustrations
  • Content Creation
Awards
  • 3xAW Site of the Day
  • 1xFTA Best Interactivity
  • 2xCSS Design Awards
  • 6xAW Honorable Mention
  • 2xRed Dot Graphic Design Awards
  • 1xAW Collections
Clients

Looking for collaboration?

Hub wire

290 Maryam Springs
Courbevoie, NYC

+1 827 48 89

Looking for a job?
Send your resume

info@hub.com
